mapper.insert: insert into customer(name, phone, email) values(#{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
insert into oath(phone, file_name, add_date) values(#{phone}, #{file_name}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from customer where phone=#{phone}
select file_name, add_date from oath where phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update customer set comments=#{comments} where phone=#{phone}
